attributes.action: The royal family to live on 53 pounds a week each
attributes.additional_details: For many years the royal famly has claimed a vast amount from the uk tax payer its a monarchy built on the deaths of thousand of inocent africans and it  is the very symbol of inhumanity and greed the royal famly are the biggest scroungers from the state and dose not represent humanity i think they should be deprived of there assesets but into reallity and the wealth and assets should be disribuited to feed the masses and genarate the economy, and the royal famly should then be forced to signe on and be seeking work and be sanctioned if they refused and have there 53 pounds a week withdrawn.
